background_color.description: Email-template only alias for the background color defined in Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Color

body_border_color.description: Email-template only alias for the border color defined in Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Color

body_border_color_choice.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.body_border_color_choice` The variable is used in HubSpot's default email templates to determine whether or not a border should be added. The setting is controlled in Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. It prints values: BORDER_AUTOMATIC, BORDER_MANUAL, BORDER_NONE

body_color.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.body_color` setting from Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Color.

content.create_page.description: This variable is True, if there is a web page version of the email.

content.email_body.description: The main body of the email. This variable renders a rich text module.

content.emailbody_plaintext.description: The optional override of the plain text email body.

content.from_name.description: The from name of the email sender.

content.reply_to.description: The reply to address for the email.

email_body_border_css.description: Email-template only alias which generates the css styles for the email border.

email_body_padding.description: The email body padding setting. This setting is located in Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Size.

email_body_width.description: The email body width setting. This setting is located in Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Size.

primary_font_size_num.description: Prints the font size number from Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Font. Excludes 'px'.

secondary_font_size_num.description: Prints the font size number from Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Font. Excludes 'px'.

site_settings.company_street_address_2.description: Prints the address line 2 from Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Footer.

site_settings.office_location_name.description: Prints the office location name from Settings > Marketing > Email > Configuration > Footer.

subscription_confirmation_url.description: Prints the URL of the subscription preferences confirmation page. This URL is dynamically generated on send.

subscription_name.description: Prints the name of the Email Type specified for that email.

unsubscribe_anchor.description: Generates an anchor tag with the work 'unsubscribe' linked to your unsubscribe page.

unsubscribe_link_all.description: Renders a link to unsubscribe from all email communications, as opposed to a link to manage subscription preferences.

unsubscribe_section.description: Renders an unsubscribe section that includes an unsubscribe link, as well as help text.

view_as_page_section.description: Generates a link with help text that leads to a webpage version of an email.

view_as_page_url.description: Generates a link that leads to a webpage version of an email.
